comments.body:
It seems that all newly added UTs fail with the following exception.
```
org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.errors.package$TreeNodeException:
The structural integrity of the input plan is broken in org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.analysis.SimpleAnalyzer., tree:
```
Yeah, let me take another look. Internally I am developing against a slightly older version of the codebase, so there might be some differences.
